message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe you would find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $11,500.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to get a good deal.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $10,500 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $11,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10,750, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at that price?
